00004	class Sanc01 extends Map15_Sanctuaire;
00005	
00006	VAR() XIIIMover PavingStone;
00007	VAR() XIIIMover PavingStoneButton;
00008	VAR() StaticMesh BrokenPavingStoneSM;
00009	
00010	EVENT Trigger(actor Other,pawn EventInstigator)
00011	{
00012		if ( PavingStone!=none && BrokenPavingStoneSM!=none )
00013		{
00014			PavingStone.StaticMesh = BrokenPavingStoneSM;
00015			PavingStone.GoToState('Locked');
00016			PavingStone.bNoInteractionIcon = true;
00017			if ( PavingStoneButton!=none )
00018			{
00019				PavingStoneButton.GoToState('Locked');
00020				PavingStoneButton.bNoInteractionIcon = true;
00021			}
00022		}
00023	}
00024	
00025	
00026

00028	{
00029	}
